alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, southwestern Dillon, northwestern Horry and Marion Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mars Bluff to near Sardis. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Lake City, Mullins, Timmonsville, Latta, Pamplico, Quinby, Sellers, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Gapway, Rains, New Hope, Galivants Ferry, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, and Effingham. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 147 and 161, near mile marker 166, and between mile markers 169 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
